item.title: Upgrading Guide
item.description:
Docker compose

When you deploy a vanilla docker compose, it will create a persistent volume for your Postgres database. As long as your volume is there, you should not lose any data.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.53.x
item.description:
Helm Chart Changes

  • This release introduces an important change to the Helm chart configuration for the initializer job.
  • DefectDojo 2.52.0 replaced Redis with Valkey in docker-compose deployment. DefectDojo 2.53.0 (chart 1.9.0) is replacing it in HELM charts.
  • Add support for HPA and PDB

HPA & PDA

Added Helm chart support for Celery and Django deployments for Horizontal Pod Autoscaler using .autoscaling fields under each section. And Pod Disruption Budget using .podDisruptionBudget for any of Celery Beat/Worker or Django deploy

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.52.x
item.description:
Fix UI overwriting service field from parsers

The web form in the UI by default sends an empty string, which ended up overwriting the service value provided by parsers.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.51.x
item.description:
Performance improvements

This release includes multiple improvements aimed at making DefectDojo faster, more scalable, and lighter on your database and workers.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.50.x
item.description: To simplify the management of the DefectDojo application, it is not necessary to set the time zone in two places (environmental variables and system settings). From now on, environmental variable is supported. Please check that the environmental variable DD_TIME_ZONE is set based on your satisfaction. Any TZ identifier is a valid value. Default value is UTC.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.49.x
item.description: There are no special instructions for upgrading to 2.49.x. Check the Release Notes for the contents of the release.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.48.2
item.description:
Tag Formatting Update

In 2.46.0 tag validation was added to disallow commas, spaces and quotes in tags. Some parsers were still creating tags with invalid characters. This is fixed in this release and this release will run another data migration to replace any invalid character in tag with an underscore ‘_’.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.48.x
item.description:
Finding Group JIRA Issue template changes

As part of PR 12475 the jira-finding-group-description.tpl was updated. If you’re using a custom set of JIRA template files, please review the PR for any changes you need to take into account.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.47.x
item.description:
Drop support for PostgreSQL-HA in HELM

This release removes support for the PostgreSQL-HA (High Availability) Helm chart as a dependency in the DefectDojo Helm chart. Users relying on the PostgreSQL-HA Helm chart will need to transition to using the standard PostgreSQL configuration or an external PostgreSQL database.

item.title: Upgrading to DefectDojo Version 2.46.x
item.description:
Tag Formatting Update

Tags can no longer contain the following characters:

  • Commas (,)
  • Quotations (both single ' and double ")
  • Spaces
